mapper.sql: a.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, a.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.DETIAL_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.URL, ssp.PRIORITY, a.OPEN_APP_TIME, a.CHECK_RESULT, a.APP_RESULT, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME

a.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, a.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.DETIAL_COUNT, ssp.ENFORCE_COUNT, ssp.URL, ssp.PRIORITY, a.OPEN_APP_TIME, a.CHECK_RESULT, a.APP_RESULT, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME

RID as EVENT_MAINRID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, KEYWORDS, SNAPSHOP, DETIAL_COUNT, ENFORCE_COUNT, PRIORITY, URL
mapper.select: select ,a.OPEN_APP_TIME,a.CHECK_RESULT,a.APP_RESULT,sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_OPEN_APP as a on ssp.RID = a.EVENT_RID where a.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_OPEN_APP set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_WEB_OPEN_APP ( RID, EVENT_RID, ACCESS_ID, OPEN_APP_TIME, CHECK_RESULT, RECTIFY_MEASURE, RECTIFY_RESULT, RESTORE_REASON, APP_LEVEL, IS_ACCEPT, REJECT_REASON, APP_USERID, APP_TIME, APP_OPINION, APP_RESULT, ISSUE_STATE, SEND_TIME, CREATTIME, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{EVENT_RID},
#{ACCESS_ID}, #{OPEN_APP_TIME}, #{CHECK_RESULT}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{RECTIFY_RESULT}, #{RESTORE_REASON}, #{APP_LEVEL}, #{IS_ACCEPT}, #{REJECT_REASON}, #{APP_USERID}, #{APP_TIME}, #{APP_OPINION}, #{APP_RESULT}, #{ISSUE_STATE}, #{SEND_TIME},
#{CREATTIME}, #{LIABMAN}, #{LIABDEPT}, #{LIABORG}, #{RECORDSTATE})
